name: vk-saoke-huydong-nhan
description: This table stores daily account balance information and related metadata for financial analysis.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the data was processed or run.

columns.name: acct_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account.

columns.name: sodu
columns.description: The balance amount in the account in local currency.

columns.name: sodu_qd
columns.description: The balance amount in the account in foreign currency.

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the record was created.

columns.name: dlh_partition_date
columns.description: The date used for partitioning the data.

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: The source from which the data was obtained.

columns.name: dlh_processed_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was processed.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year part of the date.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month part of the date.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day part of the date.
